trends: There have been 15 other sightings in Lancaster
There were no other sightings in Lancaster on or around July 3rd 2012
divs: Sighting DetailsIn backyard. saw what looked like a 3 stars but way too bright. One was about 100 feet maybe below the other. The top one was brightest of the two. A smaller dimmer light appeared to be below the less bright light. I thought it was a helicopter or plane but all 3 stayed in one spot in the same position, Very strange. It also looked like a bunch of planes flying around and passing the lights. I was looking thru binocs but couldn't get a clear view.
